name: City Mayor (itch) (ZirconiumLabs)
description:
Hi. I am the new mayor. I want to rebuild this city. I need your help. Make building higher to their max limit. You will add a floor at a time containing many units. 

When a unit is sold,  a coin appears somewhere in the city. Collect them all to make cash for new builds. Build fast! You do not have much time. 

Good Luck
